alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 4:44PM CDT until April 27 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Logan County in west central Nebraska... Southeastern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 444 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Ringgold, or 14 miles southeast of Tryon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lincoln, southwestern Logan and southeastern McPherson Counties. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 215 and 220, and near mile marker 233. Highway 97 between mile markers 6 and 13. Highway 83 between mile markers 90 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
